name: Bullet Hell Basketball
description:
Its like basketball, but with bullets! Join the Yellow Team or Blue Team in projectile based madness! Go head to head in an intense 1v1, or gather your crew for an up to 8 player big city brawl! Need to dust off your moves? Try the quick tutorial on for size, or practice your shots in the Swipe Shot Rally!

Customize the rules and the court to how you and your crew like to play, and then let the chaos ensue! This ain't JUST a basket-brawl... its Bullet Hell Basketball. Play for free now!

Play it on a web browser (has worse performance): 

https://simmer.io/@nickybakes/bullet-hell-basketball

Announcer Voice: 

Kieran Newell 

Game developed by: 

Nick Baker 

Brian Kiss 

Zach Selsley 

Tom Leonard
